translation.Bio_1: I have a degree in Digital Game Design, but I have always sought to develop myself in the area of ​​programming. I worked for 8 months as a web developer previously, working mainly with wordpress.
translation.Bio_2: And since August 2021 I'm working as a fullstack web developer working mainly with HTML, CSS, Javascript and PHP.
translation.Bio_3: I'm also doing a fullstack training in technology at DNC ​​school, looking to learn new technologies, mainly React.js and Node.js.
translation.Descrição_Biblioteca_Back: Resolution of Challenge 5 of the DNC School's technology training.
translation.Descrição_Biblioteca_Front: Project in React with API in Node.
translation.Descrição_BoardTask: Board Task Backend Express.js project made for the DNC school course.
translation.Descrição_Movie_List: Project developed in the React module with Hooks from Escola DNC.
translation.Descrição_LP_Arquitetura: Resolution of challenge 1 of the DNC School's technology training.
